aspects.aspect: Common website elements (header, navigation, footer) are responsive
judgement: All common elements are not responsive at all
At least one common element is responsive when changing between the defined viewports
All common elements look good on the defined viewports, but not between them
When scaling the browser between 360x640 and 1920x1080 (not just the defined viewports), all common elements always responds very well (no horizontal scrolling, everything readable, good breakpoints)

aspects.aspect: Pages (home, product, pricing, team) are responsive
judgement: All pages are not responsive at all
At least one page is responsive when changing between the defined viewports
All pages look good on the defined viewports, but not between them
When scaling the browser between 360x640 and 1920x1080 (not just the defined viewports), all pages always responds very well (no horizontal scrolling, everything readable, good breakpoints)

aspects.aspect: Header, Navigation, and Footer are on all pages
aspects.extraAspect: Header, Navigation, and Footer elements are on all pages and looking the same on all pages (except highlighting of the current active link is allowed)
